data.title: Chausana PIN Code & Post Office in Kairana, Muzaffarnagar, Uttar Pradesh
data.meta_description: Chausana is a Speed Post Branch Post Office aka Dak Ghar in Muzaffarnagar, Uttar Pradesh which deliver the mails and take bookings. Postal Department of India alloted 247778 PIN Code to this office. In terms of location, Chausana PO is situtated in the Kairana taluk,  Kairana postal sub-district,  Bareilly postal region,  Muzaffarnagar postal division under the  Uttar Pradesh postal circle.
data.text:
Post Office Name Chausana Branch Post Office Chausana PIN Code Number 247778 Related Sub-Office Un (Muzaffarnagar) Post Office Related Head-Office Muzaffarnagar Post Office Delivery Available? YES Circle Name Uttar Pradesh Circle District Name Muzaffarnagar District Taluk Name Kairana Town Sub-District Name Kairana Sub-district Region Name Bareilly Region Division Name Muzaffarnagar Division Address The Postmaster, Chausana Branch Post Office, Kairana, Muzaffarnagar, Bareilly, Uttar Pradesh [UP], India, PIN Code: 247778 Opening/Closing Timings In general, post offices in India operate with varying working hours. Most post offices, including Chausana, open in the morning between 8:00 am to 10:00 am and closes between 4:00 pm to 6:00 pm. The working days are Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday and Saturday. Chausana Post Office remains closed on Sundays and national holidays, unless notified. The official opening and closing timings, as well as working days of Chausana Branch Post Office, are not known to us. Customer Care Phone No. 18002666868 (9am to 6pm)

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs):

What is the PIN Code of Chausana?

Answer: The PIN Code of Chausana located in Muzaffarnagar is 247778.

Where is Chausana Post Office located at?

Answer: The complete address of Chausana Speed Post office is: The Postmaster, Chausana Post Office (Branch Post Office), Muzaffarnagar, Uttar Pradesh (UP), India

How many villages are situated near Chausana?

Answer: There are around 54 villages in Uttar Pradesh which have the same PIN code as Chausana i.e. 247778. Few of them are: Gangarampura, Garhi Hasanpur, Shamali Shamla, Rheda Harsana, Bhameri Shahpur, Funsh Garh, Un Rural and Bhatti Mazra.

What other post offices are available near Chausana?

Answer: In case you couldn't visit Chausana for some reason, other nearby post offices are: Un Muzaffarnagar, Garhi Hasanpur, Mundet Khadar, Gagaur, Pindora, Garhi Abdulha Khan, Toda, Un (Muzaffarnagar), Hath Choya and Rangana.
